phrases: Over a century ago, mankind had to face a new enemy.
The difference of power between mankind and their newfound enemy was overwhelming.
Soon, mankind was driven to the brink of extinction.
The surviving humans built three walls: the Maria, the Rose, and the Sina.
They then lived the next century in peace, under their protection.
the Colossal Titan and the Armored Titan appeared out of nowhere.
Instantly, the walls were shattered, along with the peace of everyday life.
They lost a fifth of their population, and a third of their territory,
as human activity was pushed back to Wall Rose.
the Colossal Titan once again appeared out of nowhere and broke the wall,
allowing for the further advance of the Titans.
In two hours, the evacuation of civilians was completed.
No one fell victim to the Titans,
with the exception of the soldiers who sacrificed themselves in the defense.
As long as you are there for me, I can do anything.
If the Titans attacked, us supports will not be able to hold this place by ourselves!
I must leave to oversee the organization of the reinforcements.
What the hell are you trying to say?
My actions adhere to the regulations.
I am just following the rules!
It is what soldiers are supposed to do!
If you say one more word, I will consider it as treason and punish you accordingly!
They should have heard the bells that signaled for retreat.
Why are not they climbing the wall yet?
What is the point of that?
We finally received the order to retreat, but we cannot get over the wall because we are out of gas.
We are all going to die.
They probably lost their will to fight.
But I doubt they have abandoned their mission and barricaded themselves away in the HQ.
I am guessing the Titans have them surrounded, which is why they cannot supply us with gas.
That is exactly why we have no choice but to go all in on those Titans!
Sitting here and waiting to die is not going to make a difference!
The Titans are going to surround us too!
If we keep running away from them, we would just end up wasting the little gas we have left.
Once we lose our agility, it would really be over!
I never thought I would hear you make an intelligent comment, Connie.
But how do you propose we do that with the forces we have left?
The vanguard has nearly been wiped out.
Moreover, which one of us cadets could possibly take command of such an operation?
Not that we could do anything about the Titans even if someone took command.
The gas storage is probably crawling with 3-4 meter class Titans by now.
And of course, we cannot fight them inside the storage.
I had such a boring life.
If we all work together, we can do it!
No matter what we do, we will be dead before we make it out of here.
I mean, I am prepared to die...
But what exactly am I going to die for?
Were not you with the rear guard?
I think I understand the situation.
And I apologize for bothering you,
but have you seen Eren's unit?
No, and I have not seen anyone climbed the wall either.
How can I look her in the face?
I do not even deserve to be alive.
If I knew it would come to this...
I should have just died with him!
All five of them have fulfilled their duty
and died heroic deaths in battle!
So the 34th unit was nearly wiped out...
If we fight the Titans, we will end up like them.
This is not the time to be emotional.
If we take out the Titans around the HQ,
we can replenish our gas supplies and climb the wall.
But even if you are with us, there is just too many...
I can kill all those Titans there.
You are either incompetent or you are spineless cowards.
You can sit here and suck on your fingers.
You want to fight all those Titans by yourself?
There is no way you can do that!
If I cannot, then I will just die.
But if I win, I live.
Unless I fight, I cannot win.
Your oratory skills are what is pathetic.
Was the point of that to shock us into action?
It is all your fault, Eren!
Were we trained to let our comrades fight alone?!
At this rate, we are going to turn out to be spineless cowards!
I am surprised I would hear him say that.
Let us keep this fight short!
We need to kill them all before we run out of gas!
How can she move that fast?
She is using too much gas.
She will run out right away.
I do not care how skilled she is...
Without our agility, we cannot do anything!
She is not in her usual cool-headed state...
She wants to drown out her pain through action.
I lost my family once again...
Will I have to start fresh once again?
We will not get close to the HQ...
Unless we are prepared to make sacrifices.
I am going to save you!
Why could not I stop them?
Why did not I stop them?
If I had stopped them, even if by force...
Am I really cut out for this?
Am I really cut out for a position with so much responsibility?
I do not want to die!
And it is also very beautiful.
I thought I would given up.
My life has no meaning anymore.
I will never give up again.
If I died, I will not be able to remember you.
So I will win, no matter what!
I will survive, no matter what!
It finished the other Titan off?
It knew of a Titan's weak point?
We must get going before it comes this way!
It does not care about us.
It could have attacked us long ago.
It seemed like it had an idea of how to perform hand-to-hand combat.
There is just too much we do not know.
Anyway, we must hurry to the HQ!
What are we going to do without you?!
It is obvious what we need to do.
I do not have much gas left...
The gas is useless on me.
But please use it carefully this time.
I moved in without the determination to shoulder their lives.
I even gave up on my life without realizing the responsibility I held.
And it was all due to my own issues.
Your maneuver gear's good to go.
I gave you all of my blades as well.
Now that I think about it, I do not want to be eaten alive.
I will not leave you behind.
I have never heard about Titans killing their own kind.
Because what I was looking at
felt like the reification of mankind's anger.
The cadets of the 104th class stood astounded and petrified after seeing it for themselves.
Soon, however, they witnessed something even more shocking.
I Can Hear a Heart Beating
Design of the 3D Maneuver Gear (pt 1) (The spatial maneuver unit)
It reels steel cables in from the drum There are two independent axes
Design of the 3D Maneuver Gear (pt 2) (The control unit)
The control unit is a black box (The engineering department designs and improves it in secret) (The gas cylinder)
The cylinder is filled with compressed gas
No one remembers the names of the trampled flowers
Fallen birds await the next wind before they try again
Only the will to fight can change our world
Ignore those pigs who ridicule you
for having the will to step over dead bodies and move on
Our complacence as livestock strengthens this false reality
We are as free as starving wolves!
Channel the humiliation of imprisonment into your arrows and begin the resistance
Far beyond the confining walls, you will slay your prey!
As your body burns with an overflowing urge,
pick up your burning bow and gash through the twilight
Fumareta Hana no Namae mo Shirazuni
Chiriochita Tori wa Kaze wo Machiwabiru
Inotta Tokoro de Nani mo Kawaranai
I Am About To wo Kaeruno wa Tatakau Kakugo da
Kachiku no Annei Kyoi no Han'ei
Torawareta Kutsujoku wa Hangeki no Koushi da
Jouheki no Sono Kanata Emono wo Houru
Hotobashiru Shoudou ni Sono Mi wo Yakinagara
Tasogare ni Hi wo Ukatsu Guren no Yumiya
sono yume wa kokoro no ibasho
kono utsukushiki zankoku na sekai de wa
ah bokutachi wa kono tsuyosa yowasa de
Your dream is where your heart seeks comfort
It is more fragile than your life
You can abandon it, and yet always find it again
In this beautiful and cruel world
why it was we who survived
with our strength and our weakness
if reason and logic hold true no longer
sono yume wa kokoro no ibasho
kono utsukushiki zankoku na sekai de wa
ah bokutachi wa kono tsuyosa yowasa de

It is more fragile than your life
You can abandon it, and yet always find it again
In this beautiful and cruel world
why it was we who survived
